constraints.name: layer_positioning
constraints.description: 通过一系列折叠操作，将指定位置的元素移动到目标层
constraints.formal: Given N, P, and H, find a sequence of N folds (L or R) such that the P-th section ends up in the H-th layer.

constraints.name: operation_sequence
constraints.description: 折叠操作序列必须满足特定条件，使得最终结果符合要求
constraints.formal: The sequence of N folds (L or R) must result in the P-th section being in the H-th layer after all folds are applied.
